metadata.title: CVE-2024-21404 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
.NET Denial of Service Vulnerability

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-21404` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

aspnetcore-runtime-6.0 - 6.0.127-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
aspnetcore-targeting-pack-6.0 - 6.0.127-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-apphost-pack-6.0 - 6.0.127-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-host - 6.0.127-0ubuntu1~22.04.1

dotnet-targeting-pack-6.0 - 6.0.127-0ubuntu1~22.04.1

dotnet6 - 6.0.127-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1 - 6.0.127-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dotnet6 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.0.127-0ubuntu1~22.04.1').
dotnet7 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.04.1').
dotnet8 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.0.102-8.0.2-0ubuntu1~22.04.1').
